meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with purple or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The colchicum bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I planted a colchicum in my backyard for its lovely flowers.
meanings.sent3: The colchicum seemed to be showing off its vibrant colors to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The colchicum stood out among the greenery like a royal member of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the colchicum danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A drug derived from the dried seeds or corms of the autumn crocus, used in the treatment of gout.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed colchicum to help with my gout pain.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained the benefits of taking colchicum regularly.
meanings.sent3: After taking colchicum, my gout felt like it was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The colchicum worked like a superhero, fighting off my gout attacks.
meanings.sent5: I never knew relief until I tried colchicum for my gout.
